node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，是第 195 及 322 宗個案患者的家人，而第 195 宗患者於潛伏期間曾到過蘭桂坊 Pure Fitness 健身。患者於 3 月 21 日出現發燒及咳嗽症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient has no travel history, and he is a family member of patient no 195 and 322.  Patient no 195 has been to Pure Fitness in Lan Kwai Fong during incubation period.   The patient started fever and coughing since Mar 21.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 有確診者曾於潛伏期間到中環 Pure Fitness 健身，相關分店為：加州大廈蘭桂坊、中國工商銀行大廈及建業榮基中心分店。
groups.description_en: Various branches of the gym Pure Fitness - namely California Tower (Lan Kwai Fong), ICBC Tower (Garden Road, Central) and Kinwick Centre (SoHo) - were visited by patients during incubation period.

node.remarks_zh: 3 月 21 日出現發燒及咳嗽，與 #195 及 #322 是親人
node.remarks_en: Developed fever and cough since Mar 21; is family of #195 & #322
